parameters.query:
INSERT INTO ticker_buys (symbol, conviction, last_updated, trade_date, thesis)
VALUES (
  '{{$json.symbol}}',
  {{$json.conviction}},
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  '{{$("Set Date").item.json.date}}',
  '{{$json.thesis}}'
)
ON CONFLICT (symbol, trade_date) DO UPDATE
SET
  conviction = EXCLUDED.conviction,
  last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
